title: AmaWaterways Receives Four Travel Weekly Magellan Awards for 2015Travelandtourworld.com
text:
AmaWaterways Receives Four Travel Weekly Magellan Awards for 2015
AmaWaterways announced that it has received four prestigious Travel Weekly Magellan Awards for 2015. The annual awards are determined by a panel of travel industry experts selected by Travel Weekly, honoring the best in travel. AmaWaterways received the coveted Gold award for Overall River Cruise Line, along with an array of other noteworthy accolades, including:
Luxury Suite – AmaDara – GOLD Luxury Ship Restaurant Design – The Chef’s Table – GOLD River Cruise Ship – AmaSerena – SILVER
“The AmaWaterways team is grateful to have received these new awards from Travel Weekly,” said Kristin Karst, AmaWaterways’ Co-Owner and Executive Vice President. “We take great pride in our approach to design and award-winning service, and these industry awards are a testament to our entire team’s hard work.”
The Travel Weekly Magellan Awards build on the momentum AmaWaterways has seen in 2015 from across the travel industry. Earlier this year, the company was honored at Luxury Travel Advisors’ ULTRA Summit, receiving the Award of Excellence in the Best Luxury River Cruise category. The company also received Best Onboard Dining, Best Theme Cruise and Best New Ship (AmaSonata) Awards in the River Cruise category during this year’s TravelAge West WAVE Awards. The first-ever TravAlliance Travvy Awards presented AmaWaterways with Best River Cruise Line, Best River Cruise Ship (AmaSonata), and Most Innovative River Cruise Executive this year, celebrating President and Co-Owner Rudi Schreiner.
